feed.title: eddrit Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for eddrit: Version 0.11.0
entry.content: • Update login code to reduce the number of requests blocked by Reddit (not fully fixed though)

entry.title: New release for eddrit: Version 0.11.1
entry.content:
• Fix error when trying to access the page of a suspended user
  • Fix error 500 when trying to access some wrong URLs

entry.title: New release for eddrit: Version 0.12.0
entry.content:
• Fix error when trying to access the page of a suspended user
  • Fix error 500 when trying to access some wrong URLs

entry.title: New release for eddrit: Version 0.13.0
entry.content:
• Fix: do not attempt to display broken embed for bsky.app links
  • Better error message when Reddit is down or the instance is being blocked by Reddit

entry.title: New release for eddrit: Version 0.14.0
entry.content: • Add proxy support (via the PROXY) environment variable. This can be used to bypass IP-based blocks, for example if proxying the instance through Cloudflare WARP.
